author: nero_eth
content:
I was wondering, what is the behavior clients implement when it comes to debug_traceTransaction with the prestate tracer using diffMode False with regards to handling 2930 access lists.

<@465903001156976682> and me compared results from Reth and Erigon and found that Erigon (correctly?) excludes addresses and stroage keys that were on an 2930 Access Lists but were not actually touched by any transaction. Reth on the other hand includes those in the result of the prestate tracer.
Curious what other clients do?
<@360491619402776577> <@194432762315407360> <@300026497274478592> <@218935358878908416>
